title: Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 57 (Racism 3)
description:
Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 57 (Racism 3):

We have 35 titles here:

-  Anderson - Benign Bigotry; the Psychology of Subtle Prejudice (2010)

-  Birzer - Racial Profiling; They Stopped Me Because I'm --! (2013)

-  Byfield - Savage Portrayals; Race, Media, & the Central Park Jogger Story (2014)

-  Collins - All Hell Broke Loose; American Race Riots from the Progressive Era through World War II (2012)

-  Collins - Black Sexual Politics; African American, Gender, and the New Racism (2004)

-  Deggans - Race-Baiter; How the Media Wields Dangerous Words to Divide a Nation (2012)

-  Faux - The Servant Economy; Where America's Elite Is Sending the Middle Class (2012)

-  Gordon - From Power to Prejudice; the Rise of Racial Individualism in Midcentury America (2015)

-  Gotkowitz (Ed.) - Histories or Race and Racism; the Andes and Mesoamerica from Colonial Times to the Present (2011)

-  Greene & Gabbidon (Eds.) - Encyclopedia of Race and Crime (2009)

-  Hall - An Historical Analysis of Skin Color Discrimination in America (2010)

-  Holt - The Problem of Race in the 21st Century (2000)

-  Horowitz - Inside the Klavern; the Secret History of a Ku Klux Klan of the 1920s (1999)

-  Jackson (Ed.) - Race & Racism; Essays in Social Geography (1987)

-  Kennedy - The Klan Unmasked (1990)

-  King & Leonard - Beyond Hate; White Power and Popular Culture (2014)

-  Kotkin - The New Class Conflict (2014)

-  Lavalette & Penketh (Eds.) - Race, Racism and Social Work; Contemporary Issues and Debates (2014)

-  Loewen - Sundown Towns; a Hidden Dimension of American Racism (2005)

-  Moore - Encyclopedia of Race and Racism, Vol. 1,a-f (2008)

-  Moore - Encyclopedia of Race and Racism, Vol. 2, g-r (2008)

-  Moore - Encyclopedia of Race and Racism, Vol. 3, s-z (2008)

-  Nelson (Ed.) - Handbook of Prejudice, Stereotyping, and Discrimination (2009)

-  Powell - Tree of Hate; Propaganda and Prejudices Affecting United States Relations with the Hispanic World (1971)

-  Roediger - The Wages of Whiteness; Race and the Making of the American Working Class (2007)

-  Slavet - Racial Fever; Freud and the Racial Question (2009)

-  Tamura (Ed.) - The History of Discrimination in U.S. Education; Marginality, Agency, and Power (2008)

-  Thane (Ed.) - Unequal Britain; Equalities in Britain Since 1945 (2010)

-  Wallenstein - Tell the Court I Love my Wife; Race, Marriage, and Law - an American History (2002)

-  Wang - Discrimination by Default; How Racism Becomes Routine (2006)

-  Washington - Medical Apartheid; the Dark History of Medical Experimentation on Black Americans (2006)

-  Weir - Class in America; An Encyclopedia (2007)

-  Welshman - Underclass; a History of the Excluded Since 1880, 2e (2013)

-  Wilson - Race, Racism and Development; Interrogating History, Discourse and Practice (2012)

-  Winter - Dangerous Frames; How Ideas About Race & Gender Shape Public Opinion (2008)
